title: Kings Mountain National Military Park: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education      A Kings Mountain National Military Park Educational ExperienceWhether planning a field trip to Kings Mountain National Military Park or learning about the park in the classroom, our educational pages will help you create a memorable experience for your students. Find useful resources for planning a field trip. Download lesson plans, for use in the classroom or field trip. Prepare your students to be respectful stewards while visiting the park. Eastern National operates the bookstore. Teachers showing a valid Teacher ID may receive a 15% discount.
